resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105387</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105387</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206295</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Prince William Sound: An Ecosystem in Transition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prinz William Sound: Ein Oekosystem im 
Übergang</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prince William Sound : Un écosystème dans 
la transition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Príncipe William Som: Um ecosystem na 
transição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Principe William Sound: Un ecosistema nella 
transizione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρίγκηπας William Sound: Ένα οικοσύστημα 
στη μετάβαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Príncipe Guillermo Sound: Un ecosistema en 
la transición</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">spotlights the ecological issues surrounding the historic 1989 Exxon Valdez oil spill and the subsequent recovery operation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">strahlt die ökologischen Ausgaben an, welche die 
historische Exxon Valdez Ölstreuung 1989 und die folgende 
Wiederanlaufoperation umgeben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">met en lumière les issues écologiques entourant 
la flaque 1989 historique d'huile d'Exxon Valdez et l'exécution 
ultérieure de reprise.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">spotlights as edições ecological que cercam o 
derramamento 1989 historic do óleo de Exxon Valdez e a operação 
subseqüente da recuperação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mette in luce le edizioni ecologiche che 
circondano la caduta storica 1989 dell'olio di Exxon Valdez ed il 
funzionamento successivo di recupero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θέτει τα οικολογικά ζητήματα που περιβάλλουν στο 
επίκεντρο την ιστορική διαρροή πετρελαίου της Exxon Valdez 
του 1989 και την επόμενη λειτουργία αποκατάστασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pone de relieve las ediciones ecológicas que 
rodean el derramamiento histórico 1989 del aceite de Exxon Valdez y 
la operación subsecuente de la recuperación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206295</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105387</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/prince-william-sound-an-ecosystem-in-transition</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
